entry.title: Sunday: Light snow. Temperature steady near minus 9.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill minus 17 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 05 March 2023
